comment.author: 10758109@N04
comment._content: :( he already had a scared look on his face

comment.author: 29802266@N07
comment._content: He was KIA in Sept. 1915 - therefore it is rather unlikely he'd been in action prior to this portrait being taken.  Anyway, I wouldn't say he looks 'scared'; he merely looks dignified.  Life wasn't so easy in those days in the first place, and people didn't tend to go about wearing a self-satisfied grin such as many now do.
